/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApFormBxDDao.selectApFormBxD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = M.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.FORM_BX_ID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.FORM_BX_ID, T.COMP_ID, T.FORM_BX_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.FORM_BX_PID, T.SORT_ORDR, T.USE_YN, T.REGR_UID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.REG_DT, 120) REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.MOD_DT, 120) MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_D WHERE COMP_ID = T.COMP_ID AND RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM AP_FORM_BX_D T
AND T.FORM_BX_ID = #{formBxId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.FORM_BX_PID = #{formBxPid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.FORM_BX_ID IN (SELECT FORM_BX_ID FROM AP_FORM_BX_DEPT_R WHERE FORM_BX_DEPT_ID IN #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.FORM_BX_ID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
